summary: Adds a custom Nord Archer follower, named Alaaria to "The Bee and Barb" in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: Also uploaded on the Steam Workshop (http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=280908946) by me, just with another username (SpyroCool).

Adds a custom Nord Archer follower, named Alaaria to "The Bee and Barb" in Riften.

She's equipped with Guild Master Armour (without the hood), and with an Elven Bow with Elven Arrows. She also knows the first word of Unrelenting Force (If requested, I'll make a version without the Shout).

Place this mod before any Follower Overhauls Mods (UFO, AFT, etc) if you have them on your load order or she won't follow you.

UPDATE 7/7/14 (1.1): Now able to be married.
author: NuclearMuffinCookie

files.name: Alaaria - Nord Archer Follower
files.changelogHtml:
Made Alaaria available for marriage.
Uploaded to Skyrim Nexus.

files.name: Alaaria - Nord Archer Follower - NO SHOUT VERSION
